issue.title: N3846 Extending static_assert

discussion.p: Issaquah 2014: EWG discussed the paper, and found preference towards option 3, which allows implementations to use useful messages, but doesn't force them to document what they provide, so it was seen superior to the other alternatives. The proposal is expected to go forward to Core, and it has wording already.
Adopted into the working draft in Urbana,as N3928.

issue.resolution: The paper contains the proposed wording.
